life on the farm

Unless you've grown up around farms, you may not realize how many different jobs a farmer does. Here are just a few of them. (Don't worry about feeding this particular pig, though. He's doing fine all by himself!). Please let us know if you can add any more photos to our family archive. Click on the thumbnail view here to see a larger version of the picture. Then click "back" on your browser to return to this page.
